key_observations: Macro data shows strong positive liquidity signals (US_NET_LIQUIDITY, US_M2_YOY, GLOBAL_M2_USD all POSITIVE)
Credit conditions show mixed signals with both NEGATIVE (HY/IG spreads, Fed funds) and POSITIVE (yield curve) factors
Volatility factor (VIX) shows NEGATIVE direction, indicating low volatility environment
Price data shows generally positive price action across multiple assets on T-1
Regime data indicates BULL market with very high confidence (0.98)
risk_factors: FED_RRP_BALANCE shows NEGATIVE direction, indicating potential liquidity withdrawal
US_HY_SPREAD and US_IG_SPREAD both NEGATIVE, suggesting credit stress
US_FED_FUNDS_RATE NEGATIVE direction indicates restrictive monetary policy
Limited price data window (3 days) restricts technical analysis
No sentiment or onchain data available for confirmation
reasoning_summary: Analysis based on available macro data showing predominantly positive liquidity conditions supporting bull regime, with credit factors presenting some risk. Price action generally positive but limited data. No technical indicators available. Fragility score reflects stable conditions with elevated caution due to credit risks.

D_btc_specific.note: Global regime assessment, not BTC-specific in this cycle
